Description:
The FHIR Medication resource defines detailed information about a medication order's product or package. The Medication resource is not specific to any patient.

For the majority of use cases, you should use Medication.Read instead.
SampleResponse:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<Bundle xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<type value="searchset" />

<total value="1" />

<link>

<relation value="self" />

<url value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/DSTU2/Medication?_id=TQeCuTQBplCtZ9L7grh5EXQB" />

</link>

<entry>

<link>

<relation value="self" />

<url value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/DSTU2/Medication/TQeCuTQBplCtZ9L7grh5EXQB" />

</link>

<fullUrl value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/DSTU2/Medication/TQeCuTQBplCtZ9L7grh5EXQB" />

<resource>

<Medication>

<id value="TQeCuTQBplCtZ9L7grh5EXQB" />

<code>

<text value="HONEY 5 GM/5ML PO SYRP" />

</code>

<product>

<form>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.861.1.7.4.698288.310" />

<code value="54" />

<display value="Syrup" />

</coding>

<text value="Syrup" />

</form>

</product>

</Medication>

</resource>

<search>

<mode value="match" />

</search>

</entry>

</Bundle>

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

entry.Name: entry
entry.Description: A single entry in the resource bundle.

resource.Name: resource
resource.Description: A single resource returned as part of this bundle.

Medication.Name: Medication
Medication.Description: An instance of the DSTU2 Medication FHIR resource.

code.Name: code
code.Description: A code or set of codes that identifies this medication. This could be a standard drug code such as a drug regulator code, RxNorm code, or SNOMED CT code. It could also be a local formulary code, optionally with translations to the standard drug codes.

product.Name: product
product.Description: Information that only applies to products (not packages).

form.Name: form
form.Description: Describes the form of the item, such as powder, tables, or carton.
